entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
